name: Connection (itch)
description:
More information about talented artist Stellardrone can be found here:
https://www.facebook.com/stellardrone/
https://stellardrone.bandcamp.com

Support:
For more information, questions or comments, feel free to contact us here:
https://www.facebook.com/connectionappgame/

Language Support:

Connection currently supports the following languages:

English, Afrikaans, Arabic, Chinese, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Russian and Spanish.

These translations were generated by Google Translate, so there will likely be some wording and syntax errors. Any revenue generated by Connection will be put towards professional translations, as well as additional chapters and game-modes.
